title: Elo problems..
body: Me and my friend who duo, are bronze. We are actually bronze 1. But when we play norms, we keep getting plats, diamonds and golds. Why is that?

replies.body: maybe you play with someone who got the plat level in your game but he still at bronze ( my friend is gold and play like a gold but this season he still stuck at bronze II)
Nah, they were like, plats and goods and diamonds this season and they don't play like bronze at all...
